remarks.format:
## Examples In the following example, IgnoreCase is set in a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.PropertyCondition>.
[!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#110](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#110)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#110](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#110)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.PropertyConditionFlags IgnoreCase = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that comparison with a string property value is not case-sensitive.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Automation.PropertyConditionFlags None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the property value is tested using default behavior (case-sensitive comparison for strings).
